subsection.name: MVC initializer valve
subsection.p: The pipeline valve that initialize all needed data for mvc pipeline processing

subsection.name: MVC results valve
subsection.p: The pipeline valve that read the processing result and write it to servlet response

subsection.name: Action executor valve
subsection.p: The pipeline valve that execute the action if appears in request.

subsection.name: Component tool factory
subsection.p: The component produces the context tool used to include the MVC components within the view.

subsection.name: MVC Class Finder
subsection.p: An interface finder for finding MVC model classes.

subsection.name: MVC Template Finder
subsection.p: An interface finder for finding MVC templates that should be used for rendering specific views or components.

subsection.name: MVC Finder
subsection.p: The default implementation of the finder interfaces.

subsection.name: Name sequence factory
subsection.p: The component produces a class or template name sequence for the specified view.

subsection.name: Builder executor valve
subsection.p: Pipeline component for executing MVC view building.
